svg.style: background: #FFFFFF; background-color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0" version="29.4.0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="J3AvhJMefyLSRCTLoU2K"> <mxGraphModel dx="1503" dy="850" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="0" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1120" pageHeight="630" background="#FFFFFF" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-2" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontColor=light-dark(#000000,#FFFF66);" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="340" x="60" y="460" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-3" parent="1" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="180" width="220" x="205" y="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-4" parent="1" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="<div><br></div><br><div><br></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="210" width="310" x="390" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-5" parent="1" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="210" width="370" x="720" y="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-7" edge="1" parent="1" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="220" y="420" /> <mxPoint x="170" y="370" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="210" y="450" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="220" y="370" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-10" edge="1" parent="1" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="380" y="250" /> <mxPoint x="370" y="210" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="370" y="260" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="420" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-11" edge="1" parent="1" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="730" y="160" /> <mxPoint x="680" y="110" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="680" y="160" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="730" y="110" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-14" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontColor=light-dark(#000000,#FFFF66);fontSize=15;" value="<div>Alright, time to load</div><div>&nbsp;the kernel into memory.</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="170" x="230" y="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-15" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontColor=light-dark(#000000,#FFFF66);" value="<div><font style="font-size: 24px;">Boot Loader</font></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="230" x="115" y="460" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-16" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<span style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 51, 51));"><font style="font-size: 16px;">Egg-and-Chicken problem</font></span>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="350" x="60" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontColor=light-dark(#000000,#FFFF66);fontSize=15;" value="<div>But wait,&nbsp; the kernel is stored</div><div>&nbsp;somewhere</div><div>&nbsp;in the root filesystem.</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="160" width="430" x="330" y="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Na5-Petaf8mjxY_jC8WG-19" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontColor=light-dark(#000000,#FFFF66);fontSize=15;" value="<br><div>How am I gonna access</div><div>&nbsp;the kernel&nbsp; and its parameter?</div><div>Only Kernel can initiate a filesystem.&nbsp;</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="90" width="310" x="750" y="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
